root: ^To fulfill the ancient prophecy, you must bring me to the end of this terrible place.
^Be sure to shine your flashlight on them to temporarily disable them.
^Yes..temporarily. How can you kill that which is already dead!?
^Left click or press the north button on your game pad to shine your light, but be careful.
^Your flashlight can run out of battery. In that case, be sure to run and hide so it can charge.
